title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 105.4 - Court-assigned counsel to continue representation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 105.4 - Court-assigned counsel to continue representation

State Regulations

Unless otherwise ordered by the Appellate

Division, if the defendant is represented in a superior court by court-assigned
counsel, such counsel shall continue to represent the defendant in any appeal
by the People of an order reducing an indictment or dismissing an indictment
and directing the filing of a prosecutor's information. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
105.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
